dict.string:
PARAM="{query}"
interfaces=($(/sbin/ifconfig -l))
echo '<items>'
if [ $PARAM != "" ]; then ip=($(/sbin/ifconfig $PARAM|grep inet|grep -v inet6|awk '{print $2}'|tr -d "addr:")) if [ $ip != "" ]; then echo '<item arg="'$ip'" uid="'1'" valid="yes"><icon>icon.png</icon><subtitle>点击拷贝至剪贴板</subtitle><title>'网卡 $PARAM 本地IP $ip'</title></item>' else echo '<item uid="'1'" valid="no"><icon>icon.png</icon><subtitle>请重新输入</subtitle><title>'网卡 $PARAM 不存在 或者没有ipv4地址'</title></item>' fi else i=1 for interface in ${interfaces[@]} do ip=($(/sbin/ifconfig $interface|grep inet|grep -v 127\.0\.0\.1|grep -v inet6|awk '{print $2}'|tr -d "addr:")) if [ $ip != "" ]; then echo '<item arg="'$ip'" uid="'$i'" autocomplete="'$interface'" valid="yes"><icon>icon.png</icon><subtitle>点击拷贝至剪贴板</subtitle><title>'本地网卡 $interface IP $ip'</title></item>' let i+=1 fi done fi
ip=`dig +short myip.opendns.com @resolver1.opendns.com` echo '<item arg="'$ip'" uid="'$i'" autocomplete="'$interface'" valid="yes"><icon>icon.png</icon><subtitle>点击拷贝至剪贴板</subtitle><title>'本机公网 IP $ip'</title></item>'
echo '</items>'
